SciViz: Creates Publication-Ready Visualizations for Astronomy, Psychology, and Neuroscience Data

Source: R/SciViz-package.R
SciViz-package.Rd

This package allows scientists to create publication-ready visualizations without having knowledge of how to code graphs in R.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/chenning2011/SciViz

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/chenning2011/SciViz/issues
